title: hack3rcon
author: hack3rcon
content: Hello,I have two questions:1- I want to swap the USDT BEP-2 to the Bitgert via PancakeSwap. Is it possible? Or it must be BEP-20?2- How to see the full list of token holders and not just the top 1,000 holders?Thank you.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: 1. There's no USDT token that run in Binance network (BEP-2), but there's USDT token that run in Binance smart chain network (BEP-20) since you're mention Pancakeswap, you're mistaken to write BEP-2 instead of BEP-20 since this swap platform only accept BEP-20. Yes you can, but you need to import the Bitgert coin first from Coinmarketcap, make sure you're check the contract first.Quote from: https://pancakeswap.finance/Anyone can create a BEP20 token on Binance Smart Chain with any name, including creating fake versions of existing tokens and tokens that claim to represent projects that do not have a token.If you purchase an arbitrary token, you may be unable to sell it back.2. Just use blockchair or any other blockchain trackers.

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Thank you so much for your reply.But, Trust Wallet has it: https://www.wjsnews.com/how-to-convert-usdt-to-smart-chain-on-trust-wallet/Any idea?

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: 1. You can't swap anything on pancakeswap using an exchange address mate, you have no control of the Bigert address so how will you connect your Bitgert address to pancakeswap for swapping? Use your trust wallet or other to connect and buy USDT on Pancakeswap then send to Bitgert.2. You can track all tokens holder using the token smart contract address on Bscscan or Etherscan.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 20, 2022, 08:24:45 AMThank you so much for your reply.But, Trust Wallet has it: https://www.wjsnews.com/how-to-convert-usdt-to-smart-chain-on-trust-wallet/Any idea?I can't open the site, but since it's mention smart chain, pretty sure it's Binance smart chain (BEP-20), as I said above it must be BEP-20.Since you have USDT BEP-20 or BSC chain, you need to connect your wallet to Pancakeswap and then add Bitgert by creating new token on Pancakeswap. BEP-2 address will start with "bnbxxx" while BEP-20 will start with "0xyyy" or same like ERC-20 address.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 20, 2022, 08:24:45 AMThank you so much for your reply.But, Trust Wallet has it: https://www.wjsnews.com/how-to-convert-usdt-to-smart-chain-on-trust-wallet/Any idea?it's USDT based on Binance smart chain (BEP20) not BEP2. As far as I know, Pancakeswap supports Binance smart chain, Ethereum network and AptosHere: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x8fff93e810a2edaafc326edee51071da9d398e83 but the last 24-hour trading volume is 0 USD LOL. Not sure how you will do it
